channel.title: Java
channel.description:
I'm using The PI Soruce OverloadX
The 64 Run button does not work well it does but I get a message stating that can not find Can not find Xxm500
[code]@echo off color 0a start "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Just use:

java client 30 0 lowmem members 32

Read full topic

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @smil3 smil3
item.description:
@smil3 wrote:

change

@echo off
color 0a
start “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m client 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

that to …

@echo off
title ‘‘YOU’R CLIENT NAME’’(delete this and ‘’ )
start “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m client 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
